review: The Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer. Those wanting to use Chromecast on their PC would need to be using the Google Chrome browser. It also will not stream Amazon videos.
author: Bill Hutton

review: Exactly what I was waiting for!!! You can now cast your screen, and I teach a lot of classes... Being able to push my power point from my phone is exactly what I needed... The new Beta version allows you to do this ....

review: It's an excelent device. I'm really satisfied
author: Daniel

review: Performs as expected, for a rather minimal price. Easy to set up and get running. My Sony TV is supposed to be "smart", for example it has Netflix connectivity. I was never very happy with it's performance, particularly unreliability connecting to Netflix. But the Google Chromecast is much faster, and 100% reliable. For modest cost, it fixed the Sony's limitations.
author: David Brender

review: Awesome!  There is a learning curve to figuring out how to make this work (so be patient), for Amazon, but once you get the correct app it is so user friendly.  From casting facebook on my TV to casting Netflix, fox and others I can't be happier with this purchase.
author: Downing "Darcy Downing"

review: This is an awesome idea in theory but the technology is only as good as your internet provider and it doesn't disclose that.  Fortunately we have great internet speed but I know friends who have purchased this and been greatly disappointed.  Also, the compatibility of this device with my "new" HTC phone is a little sketchy.  Not enough Apps yet to be worth your time or money.  Maybe in a year or two it will be worth it.
author: Dennis Dotson
